description: A hearty and comforting beef stew packed with lentils and vegetables.
name: Beef, Lentil & Mushroom Stew Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium carrots, peeled and chopped into chunks
2.4 cups beef stock, made with two cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oven to 140°C/120°C fan-forced. Drizzle a flame proof casserole dish on a medium high heat with half the oil and brown the beef chunks in two or three batches for 3 minutes each. Remove with a slotted spoon and set aside on a plate.
Add the rest of the oil and fry the onion, celery, carrot and mushrooms for 7 minutes to soften, add the rosemary sprigs and garlic and cook for a further 2 minutes.
Add the beef back into the dish, stir in the tomato puree and balsamic vinegar, mix well to coat and pour over the beef stock. Bring to the boil and simmer for 10 minutes.

Place the casserole dish in the oven and cook for 2 hours and 30 minutes. Remove the casserole from the oven, stir in the drained green lentils and return to the oven for 30 minutes, until the meat is tender and the sauce is thick.
